name: Mining_Drones_Tiberium_SE_Patch
title: Mining Drones (Tiberium) SE Patch
author: Exhaler
description:
Compatibility patch for Mining Drones (Tiberium Compatibility Version).
Allows Mining Drones (Tiberium Compatibility Version) (by randomflyingtaco https://mods.factorio.com/mod/Mining-Drones-Tiberium) to be built in space
